translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir  
Piratini, December 14, 1838.

Not being able to properly perform the duties of the State Secretariats entrusted to me, I tender my resignation and beseech Your Excellency, Most Excellent Sir,

May God guard Your Excellency.  
Piratini, December 14, 1838.  
Most Illustrious Sir José da Silva Brandão, Minister and Secretary of the Affairs of War, Navy, and Foreign.  
Domingos José de Almeida
